PERSONA:
james is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country, and his family has been in the u.s. for generations. james is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and identifies as a protestant, although he seldom attends religious services.

politically, james is a registered republican voter who leans conservative in his ideological views. he is actively engaged in current affairs and uses the internet several times a day to stay informed. despite his retirement, james and his wife have a comfortable middle-income lifestyle, earning between $80,000 and $90,000 annually.

while james values his faith and traditional values, he is not particularly devout or evangelical in his religious beliefs. he prefers a more moderate approach to his religious practices. in his leisure time, james enjoys spending time with his family and pursuing hobbies that align with his interests and background.

overall, james is a well-educated and financially stable retiree who maintains a strong connection to his southern roots and conservative political leanings. he embraces technology and stays actively engaged in the world around him while cherishing the traditional values and beliefs that have shaped his life.
